translation.en: What are you doing, huh?
My body's been on fire.
Oh, is that so? [giggles]
Come here, then.
-Oh. -Oh, Mr. Castle. [laughs]
What did we do? We didn't do it!
translation.it: Cos'è successo? Non siamo stati noi!

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
Oh, my God, of all the childish, immature things, Tega.
translation.it: Oddio, Tega, sei proprio un immaturo.

translation.en: Look at this mess.
-[laughing] I'm sorry. -It's not funny.
-I'm sorry! -It's not funny.
-What? -Oh, uh, everyone is waiting for you both.
Okay, um, we'll be right there.
-Okay. You okay? -Okay, yeah.
I'm good, baby, I'm good.
We can't go out there looking like we just made love.
translation.it: Ti sistemo, si vede che abbiamo fatto l'amore.

translation.en: -Almost made love, please. -Tega.
Look, there's a time and place for spontaneity.
translation.it: C'è il momento e il posto giusto per certe cose.

translation.en: This is not it. Not here.
translation.it: E non sono questi, non ora.

translation.en: -All right. -Okay?
-Okay. -All right.
-We're good? -Yeah, I'm good.
I think you look all right. What about me? Do I look all right?
-You're good, you're good. -You sure?
-You. You! -You. You.
You!
Thank you all. Thank you all so much.
But you really should be saving your claps for Mike
translation.it: Ma gli applausi vanno tutti a Mike.

translation.en: because he did an exceptional job on the M & G case.
translation.it: Ha fatto un lavoro eccezionale con la causa della M&G.

translation.en: It's not every day that a firm like ours goes up against a Goliath
translation.it: Non capita spesso che uno studio come il nostro si scontri con un gigante

translation.en: like Adelegan & Partners and actually manages to secure
translation.it: come Adelegan e riesca a ottenere

translation.en: a 200-million-naira settlement for our client.
translation.it: un accordo di 200 milioni di naira per il proprio cliente.

translation.en: I don't need to tell you all how that translates into billable hours for our firm.
translation.it: E sapete bene come questo si tradurrà in ore fatturabili per lo studio.

translation.en: And it's all due to this great talent, Mike, our lawyer.
translation.it: Ed è merito di questo grande talento, il nostro avvocato, Mike!

translation.en: Now let's raise our glasses...
And our salaries we hope.
Well, you win the big cases like Mike does and you'll get a raise three times a year.
translation.it: Vincete altri casi importanti e avrete un aumento tre volte l'anno.

translation.en: Really?
Yes, in your dreams.
-To Mike. -[all] To Mike!
Cheers.
Cheers.
Speech! Speech!
Uh-uh. Who died and made you town crier?
Speech. Stop being modest.
Okay. [clears throat]
Well, first of all, I'd like to say thank you to everyone.
translation.it: Beh, prima di tutto, vorrei ringraziare tutti voi.

translation.en: Uh, when I first came into this law firm some seven years ago,
translation.it: Quando ho iniziato a lavorare in questo studio, sette anni fa,

translation.en: I was fresh out of law school and wanted nothing more
translation.it: ero fresco di laurea e non volevo altro

translation.en: than to work under the legendary legal mind of Professor Castle
translation.it: che lavorare per il leggendario professor Castle

translation.en: and his incredible wife,
our dearly beloved senior advocate of Nigeria, Remi Castle.
translation.it: la nostra amata avvocata senior, Remi Castle.

translation.en: First thing Prof and Advocate Castle told me
translation.it: La prima cosa che entrambi mi dissero

translation.en: was that this was more than a law firm.
translation.it: fu che questo è più di uno studio legale.

translation.en: -It was family. -[Tega] True.
And family sticks together always,
translation.it: E la famiglia resta sempre unita.

translation.en: sticks together no matter what.
Now the only reason we were able to mop the floor with Adelegan Associates
translation.it: Il motivo per cui sono riuscito a battere Adelegan

translation.en: is because I had the inextricable help of everyone in this room.
translation.it: è che ho avuto l'aiuto imprescindibile di tutti i presenti.

translation.en: "Inextra"-- What?
Inextricable. It means inseparable.
translation.it: Imprescindibile. Significa che non ne può fare a meno.

translation.en: Mr. Monday, who asked you?
[Mr. Monday] Ungrateful cretin.
In conclusion, I would like to say this victory belongs to every one of us.
translation.it: Voglio dirvi che questa vittoria è di tutti noi.

translation.en: And as my people like to say,
translation.it: E come si dice dalle mie parti:

translation.en: the broom is much harder to break when it's bunched up together.
translation.it: "la scopa è più difficile da rompere quando è con le altre".

translation.en: -Hear, hear! -So to all of us.
-To all of us! -[Remi] Yes! To Mike.
translation.it: - A tutti noi. - Sì! A Mike!

translation.en: Now we celebrate.
-[cheering] -Ah, wait, wait!
Hold on, hold on. Moderately though, moderately.
Because I don't want to hear stories of hangover tomorrow.
translation.it: Perché domani non voglio sentire scuse per la sbornia.

translation.en: And especially you, Captain.
Me? Hundred percent no hangover, sir.
translation.it: Io? Può starne certo. Al cento per cento, signore.

translation.en: It seems that someone neglected to inform me about today's celebrations, I suppose.
translation.it: Qualcuno, qui, ha evitato accuratamente di informarmi dei festeggiamenti di oggi.

translation.en: [Remi] Oh, no, sorry, Daddy. It's just a small office thing.
translation.it: No, scusa, papà. È una cosa da poco.

translation.en: But how did you find out about it anyway? It is my business to know things, my dear, eh?
translation.it: - Come l'hai saputo? - Sapere tutto è il mio lavoro, cara.

translation.en: Especially defeating the oldest and most influential law firm in Lagos
translation.it: Soprattutto se abbiamo sconfitto il più prestigioso studio legale di Lagos

translation.en: in a 200-million-naira litigation.
translation.it: in un contenzioso da 200 milioni di naira.

translation.en: -It's a big deal. -It's a big deal, yes.
translation.it: - È una cosa importante. - È vero.

translation.en: The entire Lagos legal fraternity is talking about it.
translation.it: Tutti gli addetti ai lavori di Lagos non parlano d'altro.

translation.en: As they should.
[in Yoruba] Aha! Excuse me.
-You must be the man of the moment, abi? -Greetings, Chief.
translation.it: - Tu devi essere l'uomo del momento. - Salve, capo.

translation.en: It is lawyers like you who assure me that my investment is secure.
translation.it: Con avvocati come te, il mio studio è in buone mani.

translation.en: Congratulations. And why is the young man not yet a partner in the firm?
translation.it: Congratulazioni. Perché questo giovane non è ancora socio dello studio?

translation.en: Well, with all due respect, only partners can decide who makes partner.
translation.it: Con tutto il rispetto, solo i soci decidono chi diventa socio.

translation.en: Well, maybe,
but you forget whose name is on the building.
translation.it: Ma dimentichi di chi è questo palazzo.

translation.en: Or you forget whose name is on the firm.
translation.it: O forse tu dimentichi di chi è questo studio.

translation.en: -Really? Look-- -This is Castle--
Tega, please. Not now, not here.
translation.it: Tega, per favore. Non adesso, non qui.

translation.en: -Please. -I'll be in my office.
translation.it: - Ti prego. - Mi trovi nel mio ufficio.

translation.en: Really?
Well, left to him,
translation.it: Beh, se lasci fare a lui,

translation.en: this firm will be providing pro bono services
translation.it: questo studio lavorerà solo pro bono

translation.en: to every disgruntled houseboy in Lagos.
translation.it: per tutti i ragazzini scapestrati di Lagos.

translation.en: Don't be ridiculous, Daddy.
Look, you did not become a senior advocate of Nigeria
translation.it: Non sei diventata una delle più importanti avvocate della Nigeria

translation.en: just to squander your services free.
Neither did Tega.
He is not a senior advocate.
He's not even a professor, a real professor. No.
translation.it: Non è nemmeno un vero professore.

translation.en: Daddy, what-- Come, let me get you a drink.
Please, what would you like? Do you want Rémy Martin or champagne--
translation.it: Cosa vuoi, Rémy Martin o champagne?

translation.en: You do recognize that things are about to change for Castle & Castle?
translation.it: Ti rendi conto che le cose cambieranno per la Castle&Castle?

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] Do you know that? -Yes, I know.
translation.it: - Lo sai, vero? - Sì, lo so.

translation.en: And your client base is also now going to include
translation.it: D'ora in poi, la vostra clientela includerà

translation.en: the richest and most powerful corporations in the country.
translation.it: alcune tra le più ricche e potenti società del Paese.

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] You know that? -Yes, Daddy. I know, okay.
Now that we've agreed on that, what would you like to drink?
translation.it: Ora che ci siamo chiariti, cosa vorresti bere?

translation.en: Want some champagne?
-Yes. -Let me pour you. This is a clean glass.
translation.it: - Sì. - Ok, questo bicchiere è pulito.

translation.en: [woman] I'm running a little bit late,
so please don't let Chisara stay up too late watching cartoons.
translation.it: Fa' in modo che Chisara non guardi i cartoni fino a tardi.

translation.en: Love you.
Hey, Nneka.
I couldn't help but notice how impressed you were with Mike.
translation.it: Ho notato che sei rimasta colpita da Mike.

translation.en: -Oh, but he's impressive. -Mmm.
Um, what would you say if I told you
that I could have closed that case during the first court hearing?
translation.it: che io avrei potuto chiudere la causa alla prima udienza?

translation.en: Mr. Monday, are you saying that you could've done a better job?
translation.it: Signor Monday, mi sta dicendo che lei avrebbe fatto di meglio?

translation.en: Precisely.
But you're not a lawyer.
Oh, do you have to be a footballer to understand football?
translation.it: Devi essere un calciatore per capirne di calcio?

translation.en: It's not that simple.
Oh, who says? Look, I spend more time in the filing room than any of you.
translation.it: E chi lo dice? Passo più tempo in archivio di tutti voi messi insieme.

translation.en: And I have read enough journals to qualify as a SAN myself.
translation.it: E ho letto abbastanza requisitorie da saperne quanto un avvocato affermato.

translation.en: -A SAN? -Yeah.
Look, I can prove it to you.
-You see, in 1978-- -[clears throat] Mr. Monday.
Have you seen the disaster that happened in the filing room?
translation.it: Ha visto cos'è successo in archivio?

translation.en: -What disaster? -All the shelves have collapsed.
translation.it: - No, cosa? - Sono crollati tutti gli scaffali.

translation.en: It's a lie.
Hey, you don't have to take my word for it,
but I suggest you go and check it out yourself.
Nah, nah, nah. That cannot be possible.
Mmm, stand here and be saying nah, nah, nah.
When Professor is looking for a file and he can't find it,
translation.it: Ma quando il professore non troverà un fascicolo,

translation.en: you will know because you didn't do anything about the shelves.
translation.it: glielo spieghi lei perché non ha sistemato gli scaffali.

translation.en: -Stella. -Hmm?
Thank you, but you didn't have to lie.
translation.it: Grazie, ma non c'era bisogno di mentire.

translation.en: First of all, you're welcome.
Second of all-- [clears throat] I didn't lie.
The shelves have collapsed.
[in Pidgin] Oh, my God.
Hurricane Katrina.
What happened?
Stella, now, tell me.
Well, it seems that Prof and Remi were, um--
translation.it: Beh, il professore e Remi stavano...

translation.en: [clears throat] How do I say it?
Obeying the instructions from Genesis chapter 1, verse 28.
translation.it: Osservavano l'invito al versetto 28, capitolo 1 del Libro della Genesi.

translation.en: What instructions?
"Be fruitful and multiply."
What?
They were...
It's not me that told you.
You know, I really should've volunteered to be lead counsel on that M & G case.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto offrirmi volontario come consulente capo per la causa.

translation.en: Labor law is not your strong point. Besides, you're not as good as Mike.
translation.it: Non ti occupi di diritto del lavoro. E non sei bravo come Mike.

translation.en: Ouch.
[in Pidgin] Guy, haven't you ever heard of having sympathy for a brother?
translation.it: Non sai provare compassione per un fratello?

translation.en: You want sympathy?
Go get a room at LUTH.
You know, Maliq, sometimes, just sometimes,
you can try and sugarcoat your opinions so that at least you seem slightly friendly.
translation.it: potresti addolcire le tue opinioni e sembrare un po' più amichevole.

translation.en: I don't need friends.
Hey.
Uh, Maliq.
So, uh, I noticed you haven't touched your drink.
translation.it: Ho notato che non hai bevuto il tuo drink.

translation.en: Really?
Nope, he's just been holding onto it all night.
-What's that about? -I don't drink.
Then why are you putting on a show?
It's easier than having to explain.
Cool.
But you also know that's kind of creepy.
translation.it: Ma sai che è un po' inquietante?

translation.en: It's Maliq. Middle name: Creep.
translation.it: È Maliq. Di secondo nome fa "Inquietante".

translation.en: Tired already, old man?
Mrs. Castle.
Yes, Mr. Castle.
Whatcha doin'?
Working?
Hey, you.
Your dad might have the key.
I already locked the door.
translation.it: Ho chiuso la porta a chiave.

translation.en: [sighs] He just might really come in
-with his spare key. -Look at you.
translation.it: - con la sua chiave. - Ma guardati!

translation.en: Here I am, horny as hell, and all you want to talk about is my dad.
translation.it: Sono qui, arrapata come non mai e tu parli solo di mio padre.

translation.en: I see that victory makes you horny, right?
translation.it: Vedo che la vittoria ti ha eccitata.

translation.en: You know this. I love victory.
[moans] Mr. Castle.
Hey, you're not gonna help me?
Oh, no. My work is done here.
-See you. -Mrs. Castle!
You like it, Mr. Castle, don't you?
[groans] Damn.
Hi, Prof.
Hey.
Ah, sorry about the mess.
-Oh, yeah. -Must have been the wind.
Yeah. The wind.
Can I help?
Please.
Enjoy.
And what's the life of the party doing out here all by himself?
translation.it: Cosa fa il festeggiato qui tutto solo?

translation.en: Lawyers don't usually suck at parties.
translation.it: Gli avvocati, di solito, sanno festeggiare.

translation.en: These ones? [scoffs]
Plus, I'm not out here alone, am I?
translation.it: E poi non sono qui da solo, o no?

translation.en: Listen, the firm is arranging a substantial bonus for you.
translation.it: Ascolta, lo studio ti darà un bonus sostanzioso.

translation.en: It's our way of saying thank you.
translation.it: È il nostro modo di ringraziarti.

translation.en: Oh, I thought partnership was in the cards.
translation.it: Pensavo avremmo discusso la nomina di socio.

translation.en: [laughs] You wish.
Is it unreasonable for me to expect one, though?
I mean, after all the work I've done. You heard what your father said.
translation.it: dopo quello che ho fatto? Hai sentito tuo padre.

translation.en: Out of the question.
You know how Tega feels about that.
Look, I'm not saying no. I'm just saying wait.
translation.it: Non dico che non lo diventerai, ma devi aspettare.

translation.en: For how long?
For as long as it takes.
Well, then I suppose now is a good time as any to break it to you.
translation.it: Allora suppongo che sia un buon momento per dirtelo.

translation.en: Break what?
I'm leaving the firm.
What?
-What do you mean? -I'm starting my own practice.
translation.it: - Che vuoi dire? - Apro uno studio tutto mio.

translation.en: We've been good to you. I've been good to you.
translation.it: Siamo stati buoni con te. Io sono stata buono con te!

translation.en: Yes, we've all been good to each other.
translation.it: Sì, siamo stati tutti buoni l'uno con l'altro.

translation.en: But it's not enough.
I am the best lawyer you have in this firm and you keep holding me back.
translation.it: Sono il vostro miglior avvocato ma mi tenete legato.

translation.en: No one is holding you back!
[chuckles] You two will never make anyone partner.
translation.it: Non nominerete mai nessun altro socio.

translation.en: -And you know it. -No, Mike--
And all the pro bono work Prof is having us chase after.
translation.it: E di tutti quei casi pro bono che devo seguire per tuo marito…

translation.en: -I just couldn't care less. -What pro bono work?
translation.it: - non me ne frega niente. - Quali casi pro bono?

translation.en: Why do I keep hearing about pro bono work?
translation.it: Perché tutti mi parlano di casi pro bono?

translation.en: You don't even know?
-The Amina Junaidu case. -What Amina Junaidu case?
Go ask Prof.
Okay, fine I'll ask him. But you can't leave.
translation.it: Va bene, glielo chiederò. Ma non puoi andartene.

translation.en: You said it yourself out there. We're family.
translation.it: L'hai detto tu stesso, siamo una famiglia.

translation.en: Listen, I'll make sure Prof doesn't give you any more of those pro bono cases, okay?
translation.it: Senti, mi assicurerò che non ti dia altri casi pro bono, ok?

translation.en: Remi, the point is, I'm wasted here.
translation.it: Remi, il punto è che qui sono sprecato.

translation.en: Mike, who gave you a chance
translation.it: Mike, chi ha creduto in te

translation.en: when you were just a young fresher coming out of law school?
Who built you into the lawyer that you are today?
translation.it: Chi ti ha fatto diventare l'avvocato che sei?

translation.en: And gave you the opportunities that you want to now take to stab us in the back?
translation.it: Sono stata io! E ora ci pugnali alle spalle?

translation.en: That's the problem with this place.
translation.it: È questo il problema con voi.

translation.en: With you, everything is personal.
A practice is predicated on objectivity and professionalism. This...
translation.it: La pratica si basa su obiettività e professionalità. Questo…

translation.en: This is a mom-and-pop shop.
My decision is a professional one. Don't make it personal.
translation.it: La mia è una decisione da professionista. Non prenderla sul personale.

translation.en: Everyone is a person, Mike.
So that makes it personal.
translation.it: Per questo la prendo sul personale.

translation.en: You'll get my resignation letter in the morning.
translation.it: Avrai la mia lettera di dimissioni domattina.

translation.en: Don't do this.
Nike, give us a moment.
And final warning on the dress code.
Mike is leaving.
-What? -Yeah.
-How? -He just told me.
He's resigning to go and start his own firm. Oh, that opportunistic son of a bitch.
translation.it: - Si dimette per aprire il suo studio. - Opportunista figlio di puttana.

translation.en: No, no, no. Don't call him that.
He has a right to do what he wants.
translation.it: Ha il diritto di fare ciò che vuole.

translation.en: Okay, wait a minute. Now I'm confused. Did you encourage him to do this?
translation.it: Aspetta un attimo, non capisco. L'hai incoraggiato?

translation.en: Clearly, no. But you played your part.
translation.it: Ovviamente no, ma tu hai fatto la tua parte.

translation.en: How? I don't follow.
I saw the file.
What is that? Another pro bono case?
I'm in contact with an NGO that is campaigning for her release,
translation.it: Sono in contatto con una ONG che vuole la sua liberazione,

translation.en: but there's nothing set in stone yet.
translation.it: ma non c'è ancora niente di definito.

translation.en: So technically, that is not even an issue that has come up for discussion.
translation.it: Quindi, tecnicamente, non è un problema che è stato discusso.

translation.en: Well, it is if that's one of the reasons Mike is resigning.
translation.it: Sì, se è uno dei motivi per cui Mike si dimette.

translation.en: Rems, that is absurd.
Mike should not throw this in my face like it's something to resign about.
translation.it: Non può utilizzarlo come scusa per dimettersi.

translation.en: He probably thought about this a very long time ago.
translation.it: Probabilmente ci pensava già da tempo.

translation.en: Let him get out of here. -Good riddance. -Tega.
translation.it: - Lascia che se ne vada. In bocca al lupo! - Tega!

translation.en: -This is Mike we're talking about. -Yes.
He's an opportunistic prick.
-[sighs] -Let him get out.
You don't get it.
He's just trying to drive me crazy doing this.
translation.it: Sta solo cercando di farmi impazzire.

translation.en: He just doesn't get it!
I don't even know why we're even considering this.
translation.it: Non so nemmeno perché lo consideriamo.

translation.en: There's so many other firms that can handle this Amina Junaidu case.
translation.it: Tanti altri studi possono gestire la pratica di Amina Junaidu.

translation.en: It's a human rights issue.
translation.it: È una questione di diritti umani.

translation.en: Okay? Last time I checked, it's still a domain of the law.
translation.it: L'ultima volta che ho controllato, era una branca del diritto.

translation.en: But it's not a domain of this firm. We don't do pro bono.
translation.it: Ma questo studio non se ne occupa. Non seguiamo pro bono.

translation.en: Oh, I do!
-Tega. -Yes, darling?
-Baby. -Yes, baby?
What is this really about, hmm?
A young girl.
A young Nigerian girl
is about to be unlawfully put to death by a Nigerian court.
translation.it: sta per essere uccisa illegalmente da un tribunale nigeriano.

translation.en: And you look me in the eye and ask me what this is really about?
translation.it: E tu mi guardi negli occhi e mi chiedi qual è il motivo?

translation.en: It's what I do.
Good morning. Welcome to Castle & Castle.
Bless you, my daughter.
I need an advocate.
-I need a lawyer. -[whispering] Lawyer.
An eloquent lawyer.
Okay, um, would that be just for you or for all three of you?
translation.it: Ok, solo per lei o per tutti e tre?

translation.en: The kingdom of God has suffered a grave injustice!
translation.it: Il regno di Dio ha subito una grave ingiustizia.

translation.en: Injustice!
We will not allow the violent...
to dishonor that which belongs to God!
translation.it: di disonorare ciò che appartiene a Dio.

translation.en: -Belongs to God! -Amen.
Preach, pastor. Preach! Oh, oh!
The kingdom of God needs a lawyer--
translation.it: Il regno di Dio ha bisogno di un avvocato…

translation.en: -A lawyer! [exclaims] -to correct... that...
which has been done to the kingdom.
translation.it: ciò è stato fatto al regno.

translation.en: Grievous.
-We need to change the narrative. -Yes, we do. Change.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo cambiare la narrazione. - Sì, cambiamo.

translation.en: The children of God need a lawyer.
translation.it: Ai figli di Dio serve un avvocato.

translation.en: -A lawyer! -We do.
-I feel it in my soul. -Hah!
Sorry, the board room is busy at the moment,
translation.it: Mi dispiace, la sala riunioni è occupata,

translation.en: but if you can just sit over there,
I will get someone to attend to you shortly.
translation.it: Chiamo qualcuno che si occupi di voi, a breve.

translation.en: Just over there on that couch.
-We sit? -Someone will attend to you shortly.
-Thank you. -[Stella] Yes.
So she has been denied bail?
translation.it: Le è stata negata la cauzione?

translation.en: That is unconstitutional.
Her rights are still being infringed.
translation.it: Sono stati violati di nuovo i suoi diritti.

translation.en: Well, I think it's probably for her own good.
translation.it: Credo sia per il suo bene.

translation.en: There's no telling what the family of her late husband
translation.it: Non so cosa farebbe la famiglia del suo ultimo marito

translation.en: will do to her if they get hold of her.
It won't be funny at all. But we can secure bail,
translation.it: - Non sarebbe piacevole. - Ma possiamo ottenere la cauzione

translation.en: keep her in a safe house,
translation.it: e tenerla in una casa sicura

translation.en: somewhere outside of the state.
But the conditions of her bail are likely to preclude her from leaving the state.
translation.it: Ma le condizioni per la cauzione le impedirebbero di lasciare lo Stato.

translation.en: After all, she is charged with murdering her husband.
-Tega. -Which is true, but--
-Could I interrupt you for a second? -Yes.
Uh, hi.
Mr. Omale, this is Remi.
Remi is my wife and partner.
Rems, this is Mr. Wilson Omale, the guy in charge of the NGO
translation.it: Rems, lui è il signor Wilson Omale, il responsabile della ONG

translation.en: that is campaigning for the release of Amina Junaidu.
translation.it: che chiede la liberazione di Amina Junaidu.

translation.en: -Nice to meet you, ma'am. -Okay, nice to meet you.
Uh, can I see you real quick? It's important.
-Okay. Excuse me one minute. -Go ahead.
Okay, what's up?
So Mike is here to pick up some of his personal effects,
translation.it: Mike è qui per prendere le sue cose

translation.en: and I was wondering if we could incentivize him to stay?
translation.it: e mi chiedevo se non potessimo incentivarlo a restare?

translation.en: Uh, look, if you want to keep him, it's fine, okay?
translation.it: Se vuoi che rimanga, per me va bene.

translation.en: I want us to make him partner. That is out of the question!
translation.it: - Voglio farlo diventare socio. - È fuori questione.

translation.en: Why? What's wrong with that? How are we going to convince him to stay?
translation.it: Perché, che c'è di male? Come lo convinco a restare?

translation.en: Look, the man is arrogant, he's-he's-- he's reckless,
he's ambitious and his loyalty is questionable.
translation.it: ambizioso e la sua lealtà è discutibile.

translation.en: That man just won one of the most unbeatable cases in Lagos
translation.it: Quell'uomo ha appena vinto uno dei casi più difficili

translation.en: to clinch us that M & G case.
translation.it: e ci ha blindato la M&G.

translation.en: Surely that must count for something in his favor.
Being a partner means he now gets to have a say in how this firm is run.
translation.it: Essere socio significa poter decidere su come si gestisce lo studio.

translation.en: And what's so wrong with that? He's a capable lawyer.
translation.it: E allora? È un bravo avvocato.

translation.en: Okay, look. To be a partner is much more than winning cases.
translation.it: Senti, essere soci va oltre a una mera vittoria.

translation.en: Okay? It means he gets to decide the kind of cases that we take.
translation.it: Significa che può decidere quali casi seguire e quali no.

translation.en: Oh, don't worry. Mike doesn't want any of your pro bono cases.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti, Mike non vuole i tuoi pro bono.

translation.en: Rems, I'm not the one on trial here, okay?
translation.it: Non sono io quello sotto processo, ok?

translation.en: If you want Mike to stay, it's fine.
translation.it: Se vuoi che Mike rimanga, va bene.

translation.en: But he stays only as an associate.
Period.
Okay?
[man] Hey, baby.
What are you doing here? Is something wrong with Chisara?
translation.it: Che ci fai qui? Chisara sta male?

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Uh, I dropped her off at school.
I just need to use your Internet. What happened to the Internet at home?
translation.it: - Devo solo usare Internet. - Cos'è successo all'Internet di casa?

translation.en: Out of data.
Nnamdi, I just loaded 50 gigs last month.
translation.it: Nnamdi, il mese scorso ho caricato 50 giga.

translation.en: What do you want me to say, huh?
My research this month has been really heavy.
translation.it: Le ricerche di questo mese sono state lunghe.

translation.en: I'm way overdue. Honestly, I have to catch up.
Okay. If you want to use the Internet here,
then you're gonna have to go in the reception or in the canteen.
translation.it: devi andare alla reception o in mensa.

translation.en: What about the office?
I might have clients coming in and out.
Look, I don't know what you want me to do. If you want to use the Internet here,
translation.it: Cosa vuoi che faccia? Se usi Internet qui, potrebbero crearsi dei disagi.

translation.en: then you're gonna have to manage the inconveniences.
translation.it: Se usi Internet qui, potrebbero crearsi dei disagi.

translation.en: It's bad enough that my husband is freeloading off office resources.
translation.it: È già grave che mio marito usi le risorse dell'ufficio.

translation.en: I'm going to ask you one more time to please reconsider.
translation.it: Ti chiedo un'ultima volta di ripensarci.

translation.en: Do you have a counteroffer for me? I'm afraid not, but I can promise you
translation.it: - Hai una controfferta per me? - Temo di no, ma posso prometterti

translation.en: that a few more years at Castle & Castle will not be a waste of your time.
translation.it: che rimanere al Castle&Castle non sarà una perdita di tempo.

translation.en: Do you know the problem with Castle & Castle?
translation.it: Sai qual è il problema, qui?

translation.en: The clue is in the name.
This... firm is a two-headed monster.
translation.it: Questo studio è un mostro a due teste.

translation.en: One head wants to go one way,
translation.it: Una vuole andare da una parte,

translation.en: the other wants to go the other way.
The body doesn't stand a chance.
You and I have always been on the same frequency.
translation.it: Siamo sempre stati sulla stessa lunghezza d'onda.

translation.en: We think alike.
Tega and I on the other hand are more like...
translation.it: Io e Tega invece siamo più come…

translation.en: Oil and water?
[chuckles] I was gonna say fire and water.
He's holding all of us back with this pro bono tangent.
translation.it: Non cresciamo con i pro bono.

translation.en: He's going to run this firm down.
And that's why I need you here on my side,
translation.it: È per questo che mi servi qui, al mio fianco,

translation.en: by my side, so we don't just go off track.
Remi, you're asking me to wait.
Yes.
It will break my heart if you go.
translation.it: Mi si spezzerà il cuore se te ne vai.

translation.en: [sighs] Mine too.
I'm only telling you this as a professional courtesy.
translation.it: Te lo dico solo per cortesia professionale.

translation.en: But M & G has made it clear.
After this case, wherever I go, they follow.
translation.it: che dopo questa causa, mi seguiranno ovunque vada.

translation.en: What?
M & G's our client. That's our account!
translation.it: La M&G è una nostra cliente!

translation.en: Not anymore it seems.
What?
-[phone beeps] -Stella.
Get me M & G, Incorporated. I want to speak to Chief Yekini now.
translation.it: Chiama la M&G. Voglio parlare subito con Yekini.

translation.en: Yes, ma.
-Uh, hello, ma? -Yes?
Sorry, ma, but Chief Yekini is not on seat.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, ma Yekini non è in azienda.

translation.en: Then where the hell is he?
Okay, tell Captain that he should find him.
translation.it: Ok, di' a Capitano che deve trovarlo.

translation.en: -I don't care how he does it. -Yes, ma.
translation.it: - Non mi importa come. - Sì, signora.

translation.en: Captain, that's what happened, though. And you know me now.
translation.it: Capitano, è quello che è successo. Ora mi conosci.

translation.en: I work-- Mmm.
Captain.
What are you still doing here?
[in Pidgin] Sorry, ma. I'm on my way.
Um, excuse me, ma, these are the corpers that are doing their primary assignment here.
translation.it: Signora, loro sono i tirocinanti che faranno esperienza qui.

translation.en: Today is their orientation, so I wanted them to meet you.
translation.it: Oggi è il primo giorno, volevo che la conoscessero.

translation.en: Now is not the time for that. Let the orientation team deal with that.
translation.it: Non ora. Ci penserà la squadra dedicata.

translation.en: What about Tega? Is he back from his meeting?
Um, yes, I think the meeting's done.
Ah, Mr. Monday. Good morning.
-Good morning. -Mmm.
I think that I might have a solution to your filing room problem.
translation.it: Credo di avere una soluzione per il suo problema.

translation.en: How can you help?
-Corpers. -Good morning, sir.
[Stella] Meet Mr. Monday.
He is a very, very important man in the firm.
translation.it: È un uomo molto importante di questo nello studio.

translation.en: Yes, this is... Shola? Yes, okay, from ABU.
translation.it: Lei è Shola, dell'Università Ahmadu Bello,

translation.en: This is Chidi from Unimaid, and this is Haruna from Abuja.
translation.it: Lei è Chidi, dell'Università di Maiduguri e lui è Haruna, di Abuja.

translation.en: Yes, they are working here for their primary assignments.
Oh. Welcome to Castle & Castle.
translation.it: Svolgeranno il loro tirocinio qui. Benvenuti al Castle&Castle.

translation.en: -Thank you, sir. -Very good.
Yeah, so Mr. Monday here will take you through.
I'm sure he already has a few things for you to do.
translation.it: Sono certa che ha dei lavori da assegnarvi.

translation.en: Eh? And remember, we are only retaining one of you after your service here.
translation.it: E ricordate, a uno di voi verrà offerto di rimanere.

translation.en: So work hard, be dedicated,
impress me, and you know, you never know what will happen.
translation.it: e fatevi notare, non si sa mai cosa può succedere.

translation.en: Mr. Monday, over to you.
All right. Um, here at Castle & Castle,
translation.it: Bene, in questo studio avrete il privilegio di collaborare

translation.en: you will have the privilege of rubbing minds
with one of the best legal minds in the country.
translation.it: con una dei legali più brillanti del Paese.

translation.en: Oh, you mean Professor Castle? We can't wait.
translation.it: Con il professor Castle? Non vediamo l'ora.

translation.en: I am referring to
the Honorable Monday Esegbuyota Anidi McDonald, Esq. III.
translation.it: a Monday Esegbuyota Anidi McDonald, esquire III.

translation.en: Who's he?
He... is me.
"Incabula" simulacrum.
As I was saying, before I was rudely interrupted...
translation.it: Come dicevo, prima di essere interrotto…

translation.en: [Remi] We have a crisis-o.
-I'm listening. -If Mike leaves, M & G leaves with him.
translation.it: - Ti ascolto. - Se Mike se ne va, la M&G va con lui.

translation.en: -And who told you this? -Mike himself.
Oh, surely he's bluffing.
He's just trying to squeeze us so we can give into his demands.
translation.it: Vuole spaventarci per ottenere quello che vuole.

translation.en: And what if he's not? M & G is our anchor account.
translation.it: E se non mentisse? La M&G è il nostro cliente principale.

translation.en: Then we call Chief Yekini and confront him.
I already did that. He's off the radar.
translation.it: Ci ho provato, ma è sparito.

translation.en: Yes, hello? Captain, any news?
[Captain] Yes, ma. Yes, ma.
[in Pidgin] My nephew said Chief Yekini is currently at Ikoyi Golf Club.
translation.it: Mio nipote dice che Yekini è al Golf Club Ikoyi.

translation.en: Yes, ma. Yes, ma.
[in Pidgin] He's playing golf.
-Yes, ma. -Oh, okay. Thank you.
-Yes? -He's at the golf course.
translation.it: - Allora? - È sui campi da golf.

translation.en: So let's go.
Okay, but what if we piss him off?
Do you have any better ideas?
Come on, Rems, let's go. Let's go confront him.
Rems, it's the best thing to do right now.
translation.it: È la cosa migliore da fare.

translation.en: -Honestly, how can Mike do this? -I don't know.
translation.it: - Come può farci questo, Mike? - Non lo so.

translation.en: He's just an ambitious prick.
This is our filing and archive room,
the brain and nerve center of this glorious firm.
translation.it: Il cuore e il cervello di questo glorioso studio.

translation.en: Like Sir Ahmadu Bello once said--
translation.it: Come disse una volta Ahmadu Bello…

translation.en: -You know Sir Ahmadu Bello? -Yes, sir.
The onetime prime minister of this esteemed country
translation.it: L'irripetibile primo ministro di questo Paese

translation.en: and the Sardauna of Sokoto.
He said, "Knowledge is power."
A lawyer with no knowledge is like a gun with no bullets.
translation.it: Un avvocato senza conoscenza è come una pistola senza proiettili.

translation.en: So this is where all our knowledge is deposited.
translation.it: Ed è qui che conserviamo tutta la nostra conoscenza.

translation.en: Sorry, sir, I have a question. What happened here?
translation.it: Scusi, ho una domanda. Cos'è successo?

translation.en: That is none of your concern, hmm?
Your assignment moving forward is to return this room to its former glory.
translation.it: Il vostro compito è di riportare la stanza al suo antico splendore.

translation.en: -Oh. -Yes. Your job is to put back all the files, volumes, transcripts
translation.it: Sì, dovete rimettere tutti i faldoni, gli incartamenti, le trascrizioni…

translation.en: in their allocated shelves and boxes. Hmm?
translation.it: nelle scatole e sugli scaffali assegnati.

translation.en: This will show you where everything needs to be.
translation.it: Questo vi indicherà dove devono stare le cose.

translation.en: Don't let me down.
More importantly, don't let Castle & Castle down.
translation.it: E, ancora più importante, non deludete lo studio Castle&Castle.

translation.en: Corpers, shun!
Well, you guys know this is exploitation, right?
translation.it: Sapete che questo è sfruttamento, vero?

translation.en: Can we sue them?
-What are you doing? -You heard them, right?
translation.it: Cosa fai? Avete sentito? Offriranno il posto solo a uno di noi.

translation.en: Only one of us will be retained.
translation.it: Avete sentito? Offriranno il posto solo a uno di noi.

translation.en: Both of you can keep talking. Me, I'm here to work. Abeg.
translation.it: Voi parlate pure, io sono qui per lavorare.

translation.en: Ah! What are you doing? Give me these papers.
translation.it: Che stai facendo? Dammi il quaderno.

translation.en: -Let it go! Let it go! -Give it to me.
Listen to this.
One, two, sing.
Now, look at this.
The young man in that video is brother Demola Fagbohun.
translation.it: Il giovane del video è Demola Fagbohun.

translation.en: He now calls himself Dehido.
-A brother that was Spirit-filled. -Spirit-filled.
translation.it: - Un fratello invaso dallo Spirito Santo. - Esatto.

translation.en: [reverend] He was a member of the church choir.
translation.it: Era un membro del coro della chiesa.

translation.en: Look at the song and just listen to it.
He took a song that is inspired by the Spirit,
translation.it: Ha trasformato una canzone ispirata dallo Spirito,

translation.en: -that is so Spirit-filled-- -Spirit-filled!
translation.it: - invasa dallo Spirito… - Invasa dallo Spirito!

translation.en: ...to something that is immoral.
-Something that is demonic. -Demonic.
Satanic principality and defiled song!
-Something that is filled with lust. -[scoffs]
But, sir, this is currently the number one song in the nation.
translation.it: Ma, signore, questa canzone è in cima alle classifiche.

translation.en: -For seven weeks now. -[together] In hell.
Ah, so, you're contesting the rights to exploit the song?
translation.it: Quindi, contesta il suo diritto di sfruttare la canzone?

translation.en: Yes.
Okay. Uh, if I may ask, who exactly composed the song?
translation.it: Scusate, chi ha scritto la canzone?

translation.en: The choir.
Led by sister Nkiru Onuegbu and sister Nkechi Onuwa.
translation.it: Sotto la guida delle sorelle Nmiru Onuegbu e Nkechi Onuwa.

translation.en: Okay. So who does the song belong to?
translation.it: Quindi a chi appartiene la canzone?

translation.en: The church!
So, no one person is responsible for the song?
translation.it: Non c'è una persona proprietaria della canzone?

translation.en: Of course there is.
Oh. Who?
-The Holy Spirit! -[women exclaim]
-The Holy Spirit inspired the song. -[exclaiming]
translation.it: Lo Spirito Santo ha ispirato la canzone.

translation.en: [stuttering] So, the copyright belongs to the Holy Spirit?
translation.it: Quindi il diritto d'autore appartiene allo Spirito Santo?

translation.en: Yes!
Okay, but it's going to be hard to get proof of that from the Holy Spirit.
translation.it: Sarà difficile ottenerne la prova dallo Spirito Santo.

translation.en: -Is anything too hard for my God? -[women] Nothing!
translation.it: - Niente è impossibile per il mio Dio. - Niente!

translation.en: Is there anything too hard
-for the God that we serve? -Nothing!
translation.it: - per il Dio che serviamo. - Niente!

translation.en: -We want to sue brother Demola Fagbohun. -Yes!
translation.it: - Vogliamo fare causa a Demola Fagbohun. - Sì!

translation.en: -Dehido-- -Dehido.
for copyright infringement.
translation.it: Per violazione del diritto di autore.

translation.en: Devil.
Well, sir, I'm glad to tell you that we'll be taking your case.
translation.it: Sono felice di comunicarle che vi seguiremo per la causa.

translation.en: Hallelujah! Glory.
Can you give me a resounding hallelujah?
-Hallelujah! -[chorus] Hallelujah!
Make it a glorious hallelujah!
[Tega] Chief Yekini.
-That was a good stroke. -Hey.
Prof and Mrs. Castle.
translation.it: Il Professore e la signora Castle!

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt your golfing.
Well, you have to be. This is where I come to escape business.
translation.it: Fate bene a scusarvi. Vengo qui per non pensare agli affari.

translation.en: Well, it's a matter of urgency, sir.
Yes. Chief, as you know, your company and our firm,
translation.it: Già. Come sai, la vostra azienda e il nostro studio

translation.en: we've enjoyed two years of mutually beneficial relationship.
translation.it: hanno goduto di due anni di reciproci benefici dal nostro rapporto.

translation.en: And thanks to us, very soon another 200 million will be entering your account.
translation.it: E grazie a noi, avrai presto altri 200 milioni.

translation.en: Yeah, and a little bit of that percentage will go to you two.
translation.it: Sì, e una percentuale andrà a voi due.

translation.en: -Well, yes. -Yes, Chief.
We just want to be assured of your continued relationship.
translation.it: Volevamo assicurarci che continueremo a collaborare.

translation.en: That come rain or shine, you will be with us as we have stuck with you.
translation.it: Noi saremo sempre e comunque al vostro fianco.

translation.en: What is this thing all about?
Mike Amenechi is leaving our firm,
and he hinted that M & G will be following where he goes, so...
translation.it: e dice che la M&G lo seguirà.

translation.en: Amenechi is a damn good lawyer.
We know, sir, but
if you look at his ability to be a good lawyer or win any cases,
translation.it: ma lo è e vince le cause

translation.en: it's because he's a part of Castle & Castle.
-Yes. -Mike begs to differ.
Well, what Mike thinks is inconsequential here.
translation.it: Quello che pensa Mike è irrilevante ora.

translation.en: The question is, what do you think?
translation.it: La domanda è, tu cosa ne pensi?

translation.en: And with whom will you pitch your tent?
translation.it: E chi vuoi che ti affianchi?

translation.en: [Stella] He's not bad.
[Captain] No, no, no, no.
What are you doing?
What is-- It's none of your business, Captain.
Who is looking for love?
I said it is none of your business, Captain.
translation.it: Ho detto che non sono affari tuoi.

translation.en: Why should you be looking for something in Sokoto
when it's already in your sokoto? What-What is in my sokoto?
translation.it: - quando è a portata di mano? - Cos'ho a portata di mano?

translation.en: Captain, please, I don't--
Nothing, nothing, nothing. It's none of my business. It's none of my business.
Come on, Captain. Is there something that you know that I don't know?
translation.it: C'è qualcosa che tu sai e che io non so?

translation.en: -[elevator bell dings] -Just tell me. I don't like--
Move it! Damn!
-Damn Betty! [mutters] -[Dehido sighs]
So y'all want to sue Dehido's ass, and you still want to be taking selfies?
translation.it: Prima fate causa a Dehido e poi volete fare i selfie con lui?

translation.en: Damn!
Who? Us? Are we the ones suing you?
translation.it: Chi, noi? Siamo noi a farti causa?

translation.en: Who-- In this place? Who can sue you?
translation.it: Chi è che può farti causa, qui?

translation.en: A celebrity like you? Who can sue you?
Listen, the person that tries to sue you,
I say it will not be better for their life.
The blood of Je-- [clears throat]
Mr. Dehido, so glad you--
So glad you could join us on such short notice.
translation.it: Grazie per essere venuto con così poco preavviso.

translation.en: Um, please, the board room is...
this way.
So you want God to punish our clients, huh?
Where do you think your salary comes from?
How can you sue me for a song that is mine?
translation.it: Non puoi farmi causa per una canzone che è mia.

translation.en: -You did not write the song. -No!
translation.it: - Non hai scritto tu la canzone. - No!

translation.en: The Spirit did.
Through me! He gave me utterance. I was the person that the Spirit used.
translation.it: Attraverso di me! Mi ha parlato, lo Spirito mi ha usato.

translation.en: And that was because you were a member of the church choir.
translation.it: Perché eri parte del coro della chiesa.

translation.en: The Spirit wouldn't have given you the song
translation.it: Lo Spirito non ti avrebbe dato la canzone

translation.en: if you were singing in a nightclub.
translation.it: se avessi cantato in un night club.

translation.en: Demon, demon, demon, demon!
So now you are the only one that knows the ways of the Spirit, yeah?
translation.it: Sei l'unico che conosce le vie dello Spirito Santo?

translation.en: Spirit man.
The Spirit gave you that song to edify the people of the Lord.
translation.it: Lo Spirito ti ha dato quella canzone per edificare il popolo del Signore.

translation.en: -[women] Edify. -[reverend] To edify the church!
Yes!
-To promote the work of God. -[women] Promote.
translation.it: - Per promuovere l'opera di Dio. - Promuovi.

translation.en: And at no time did the Spirit specify when the song shall be sung.
translation.it: Lo Spirito Santo non ha mai stabilito quando cantare la canzone.

translation.en: So my client is within his rights to sing the song anytime, anywhere he likes.
translation.it: Il mio cliente ha il diritto di cantarla quando e dove vuole.

translation.en: That is a holy song
that your client is using for personal gain!
translation.it: che il suo cliente usa per scopi personali.

translation.en: Uh, Pastor.
Your G63 or whatever car you're driving, wasn't it offering money used to buy it?
translation.it: Non hai comprato l'automobile con i soldi delle offerte?

translation.en: Are you not using the money of the church for your personal gain too?
translation.it: Non usi anche tu i soldi della chiesa per scopi personali?

translation.en: Is that not the offering money? Is that not holy money?
translation.it: I soldi dell'offertorio non sono sacri?

translation.en: He called me pastor! You used to call me Papa!
translation.it: Mi ha chiamato Pastore! Mi chiamavi papà.

translation.en: You called me pastor!
-Everyone, please, calm down. -I ain't no boy.
-I ain't no boy. I ain't no boy. -Please, calm down.
translation.it: - Non sono un ragazzino. - Si calmi, la prego.

translation.en: -Mr. Dehido-- -I ain't no boy.
May I remind you that our client is not the one being sued here? You are.
translation.it: vorrei ricordarle che non è sotto processo il nostro cliente, ma lei.

translation.en: [scoffs] Whatever.
-Thank you, my beloved. -Please, everyone.
Calm down.
If this case goes to court,
translation.it: Se la causa andrà in tribunale,

translation.en: because of the subjectivity attached, it will lead to long, endless hours,
translation.it: sarà molto lunga per via di tanta soggettività.

translation.en: which would mean a lot of time and money for both parties.
translation.it: Il che vuol dire molto tempo e denaro per entrambe le parti.

translation.en: It is our recommendation that we can come to a mutually beneficial resolution.
translation.it: Consigliamo di giungere a una soluzione vantaggiosa per entrambi.

translation.en: So what do you recommend, my daughter?
That a percentage of the song's earnings be paid back to the church.
translation.it: Una percentuale dei guadagni verrà versata alla Chiesa.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] That cannot work!
That won't work! That can't work!
Mr. Dehido, you concede that the inspiration for the song
did come about on church grounds while you were a member of the choir.
translation.it: è arrivata sul suolo della Chiesa mentre era parte del coro?

translation.en: Yes, and so?
And since Mr. Dehido concedes
translation.it: Dato che il sig. Dehido ammette

translation.en: that the Spirit did reveal the song to him on church ground,
translation.it: che lo Spirito Santo gli ha rivelato la canzone in chiesa,

translation.en: it is appropriate that the percentage paid back to the church
translation.it: riteniamo che la percentuale da pagare

translation.en: is ten percent of the song's earnings...
translation.it: sia del dieci percento dei guadagni.

translation.en: which he will supplement with a free performance
of the holy version of that same song at church this coming Sunday.
translation.it: della versione sacra della stessa canzone in chiesa, domenica prossima.

translation.en: Why?
And how is that beneficial?
Pastor-- I mean, Reverend.
If news about Mr. Dehido's performance was to spread,
translation.it: Se diffondesse la notizia sull'esibizione del signor Dehido,

translation.en: think of what it would do to Sunday service attendance.
translation.it: pensi a quante persone in più avrebbe in chiesa.

translation.en: Not to mention your offering collection.
So Pastor might just be inclined to drop the lawsuit.
translation.it: Così il Pastore ritirerebbe le accuse.

translation.en: [Dehido] Um... Okay.
That's not a bad idea.
We can work with that. We can work with that.
Even in the chambers!
The Spirit has inspired.
translation.it: Lo Spirito Santo ci ha ispirati.

translation.en: -The Spirit has recommended. -Yes!
translation.it: - Lo Spirito Santo ci ha consigliati. - Sì!

translation.en: Thank you.
Yes, Lord.
Oh, Jesus...
You should invite her for the singles program--
translation.it: Invitatela al programma per i single.

translation.en: O Lord, Where Is My Man?
-You need to be there. -Where is he?
-Hallelujah. -Find him at our church.
-Wednesday and Thursday. -Wednesday and Thursday.
translation.it: - Alleluia. - Lo troverai in chiesa. Mercoledì e giovedì.

translation.en: [Stella] Bye!
[Nneka] That was short and painless.
Short and painless translates to no money for the firm.
translation.it: "Rapido e indolore" significa nessun guadagno per lo studio.

translation.en: -[Tega] Hi, Stella. How's it going? -Welcome back.
Hey, guys. Please, can I have your attention, please?
translation.it: Ragazzi, posso avere la vostra attenzione?

translation.en: Everyone, your attention, please.
I'm afraid we have some news.
Effective today, Mike Amenechi is no longer an associate of this firm.
translation.it: Da oggi, Mike Amenechi non lavorerà più per questo studio.

translation.en: That can't be right. Mike just won a big case for the firm.
translation.it: Non è possibile. Ha appena vinto una causa importante.

translation.en: Yes, it's, uh, his decision. He feels that it is time to move on.
translation.it: Sì, ma è una sua decisione. Sente che deve crescere.

translation.en: And the major crisis is the fact that M & G Holdings,
translation.it: Ma la peggiore notizia è che la M&G,

translation.en: who happens to be our anchor client and our biggest account, have dropped us.
translation.it: che è il nostro cliente principale, ci lascia.

translation.en: They've gone with Mike.
So, tough times ahead. People, we're going to have to tighten our belts around here.
translation.it: Arriveranno tempi difficili. Dobbiamo tirarci su le maniche.

translation.en: [Tega] The profit from the M & G case should tide us over for a while.
translation.it: I profitti della causa M&G dovrebbero tenerci a galla per un po'.

translation.en: We just need to hit the hours hard, you know?
Why is it always from frying pan to fire with the two of you?
translation.it: Perché con voi due finiamo sempre dalla padella alla brace?

translation.en: First, you lost your top lawyer.
translation.it: Prima perdete il vostro miglior avvocato.

translation.en: And now your top client.
translation.it: E ora il vostro miglior cliente.

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] Were you cursed? -Dad.
-Yeah? -How did you know?
I know everything.
I see everything, I hear everything.
Yesterday, we were here celebrating.
Today, we are here mourning. Eh?
Well, things seem to change pretty fast around here.
translation.it: Beh, le cose sembrano cambiare in fretta.

translation.en: Well, I hope you are happy now.
Oh, please, with all due respect, what does that have to do with me?
translation.it: Con tutto il rispetto, cosa c'entro io?

translation.en: See? You see?
Abdicating responsibility, as always.
Just as you did when you made her pregnant out of wedlock!
translation.it: Come quando l'hai messa incinta fuori dal matrimonio!

translation.en: -Dad! Please, now is not the time. -Yes?
translation.it: Papà, non è il momento adatto.

translation.en: Rems, let him. Let him get it off his chest.
translation.it: Rems, lascia che si tolga questo peso.

translation.en: Let him say his piece.
-Fine. -As far as your father is concerned,
I'm the source of all your misfortunes.
translation.it: sono la fonte delle tue disgrazie.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Look here!
Left to him, you would be a single mother now.
translation.it: Se fosse stato per lui, ora saresti una madre single.

translation.en: Huh? And a law school dropout.
How? I married her.
-You did? -Yes, I did. She is Mrs. Castle.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Sì, è la signora Castle.

translation.en: And she's my daughter.
You think I'm going to stand here and watch you drag her down again? Not ever!
translation.it: Pensi che starò qui a guardarti mentre la trascini a fondo, di nuovo? Mai!

translation.en: Stop, please!
Rems...
-[Duke] Huh? -I can't do this.
Not ever! Eh?
-Really, Dad? -Did you see that?
-Really? -Huh? Tell me!
Tell me I am wrong.
Tell me, Remi, that I am wrong.
You saw that.
Mr. Omale.
It's Tega Castle here.
I'll take the case.
Yes, I'll do it.
Oh, Stella.
Madam?
I was going and I saw you...
[clears throat] You know, I have an extra bottle of...
Thanks.
-Ah. -I would've drank it, but, you know.
-Oh, my God. Is this gin or ginger? -Sorry.
translation.it: - Oddio, è al gin o allo zenzero? - Scusa.

translation.en: It's just gin-- Well, it's just ginger
with a little bit of my special ingredient. [laughs]
-It's good. -Mmm.
It's really good. Thank you.
You're welcome.
Um, so, ma, are we in trouble?
[in Pidgin] What's all this "ma, ma, ma"?
Just drop the formality.
Sorry, sorry. Sorry, it's just that-- See, be careful what you ask for.
translation.it: Scusi, ma stia attenta a cosa mi chiede.

translation.en: 'Cause I know what those FGGC girls used to call you. I will just...
translation.it: Perché so come la chiamavano all'Università!

translation.en: [laughs] Well, don't forget, I'm still the boss.
translation.it: Non dimenticare che sono ancora il capo.

translation.en: You are. You are, you're still the boss, and you're doing an amazing job.
translation.it: È ancora il capo e sta facendo un ottimo lavoro.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Honestly.
I don't know if amazing is gonna cut it anymore.
translation.it: Non so se sarà "ottimo" sia ancora l'aggettivo giusto.

translation.en: How bad is it? Tell me.
Do you remember my fourth year in law school?
translation.it: Ricordi il mio quarto anno di Legge?

translation.en: Wasn't that, um, when you found out you were pregnant with Ben?
translation.it: Quando ha scoperto di essere incinta?

translation.en: Yes.
And I was this close to getting rid of him.
translation.it: C'è mancato poco che non mi sbarazzassi di lui.

translation.en: But you didn't, thank God.
translation.it: Ma non l'ha fatto, grazie a Dio.

translation.en: Yeah. Thank God indeed.
But you know that feeling of helplessness and not knowing what to do?
translation.it: Ma hai presente quando ti senti impotente e non sai cosa fare?

translation.en: I'm feeling that same feeling now.
Ben arrives tomorrow morning.
His timing could not be worse.
translation.it: Il suo tempismo non poteva essere peggiore.

translation.en: You're going to be okay.
You're going to be all right, I promise.
